name: Ape Together Strong!
description:
This game was made in under 7 days for the Brackeys 2021.1 game jam...

Controls:

WASD - Move

LMB - Hold to shoot

M - Summon monkeys in Sandbox mode

F10 - (WINDOWS ONLY) go into full screen

Welcome to Ape Together Strong! Inspired by games like Bloons, and Wonderful 101 -- while taking notes from Planet Of The Apes -- Ape Together Strong has you playing as Wyatt the monkey, on his journey to liberate his fellow apes and defeat the spider king!

The more monkeys you pick up, the better your stats become -- but beware, you can also lose your monkeys with the stat boosts. 

How many monkeys can you save? Let us know!

MONKEY BOOSTS:

Yellow - increases range

Red - increases damage

Blue - increases rate of fire

Black - offer a helping hand and shoots on their own!

CREDITS:
Programming and SFX: Christian Pasamba

Art: Jaylene Diaz

Music: Elena Latiano

Thanks for playing!!!!
